Título: "Towntology & hydrOntology: Relationship between Urban and Hydrographic Features in the Geographic Information

Tipo de participación:  Comunicación 
Congreso: "1st Workshop of COST Action C21 "Ontologies for Urban Development: Interfacing Urban Information Systems".

speaker: SYSTEM
